    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_10b174ad10a64c309c281402476a3fcd9a6fd38b</entry>

            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_10b174ad10a64c309c281402476a3fcd9a6fd38b</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">A pie chart illustrating percentages of harvested and lost crops</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Kreisdiagramm, das Prozentsätze der 
geernteten und verlorenen Getreide veranschaulicht</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un diagramme circulaire circulaire illustrant des
pourcentages des collectes moissonnées et détruites</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma carta de torta que ilustra porcentagens de 
colheitas colhidas e perdidas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un diagramma a torta che illustra le percentuali 
dei raccolti raccolti e persi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα διάγραμμα πιτών που επεξηγεί τα ποσοστά των 
συγκομισμένων και χαμένων συγκομιδών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una carta de empanada que ilustra porcentajes de 
cosechas cosechadas y perdidas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This pie chart illustrates the percentages of crops harvested, lost to pests, lost to diseases, and lost to weeds in Africa.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pests</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">weeds</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">crops</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">diseases</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Kreisdiagramm veranschaulicht die 
Prozentsätze der Getreide, die zu den Unkräutern in Afrika geerntet 
werden, verloren sind zu den Plagen, verloren sind zu den Krankheiten 
und verloren sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme circulaire circulaire illustre les 
pourcentages des collectes moissonnées, détruites aux parasites, 
détruites aux maladies, et détruites aux mauvaises herbes en 
Afrique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta carta de torta ilustra as porcentagens das 
colheitas colhidas, perdidas aos pests, perdidas às doenças, e 
perdidas às ervas daninhas em África.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo diagramma a torta illustra le percentuali 
dei raccolti raccolti, persi ai parassiti, persi alle malattie e persi
alle erbacce in Africa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα πιτών επεξηγεί τα ποσοστά των 
συγκομιδών που συγκομίζονται, που χάνονται στα παράσιτα, που 
χάνονται στις ασθένειες, και που χάνονται στα ζιζάνια στην 
Αφρική.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta carta de empanada ilustra los porcentajes de
las cosechas cosechadas, perdidas a los parásitos, perdidas a las 
enfermedades, y perdidas a las malas hierbas en África.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Plagen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unkräuter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Getreide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Krankheiten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">mauvaises herbes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">collectes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les maladies</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ζιζάνια</string>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">συγκομιδές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
